content.data: This is a link demonstrating the use of a Visual Basic Script file. To view or add a Visual Basic Script to a link you are utilizing you must open the PSNC.MDB file and go to the Links table. In the Links table there is a field named Program this is where a script would need to be placed. If you are not familiar with Visual Basic Script there are several publications on creating them which are available from most major book sellers.
